Text: The fabrics are detailed in this catalog.
...I see...
Do you have any samples of this black silkworm silk?

Certainly, we do. I'll bring some to you. Please wait
a moment.

...Midgar Kingdom's Mitsugoshi has quite an
impressive collection.
You honor us with your kind words.

And to think someone as young as yourself is running
this company.

Oh, no, I owe everything to the previous owner.
I'm still finding my footing—

Thank you for choosing our products. We look forward
to you shopping with us again.

...Why haven't you opened a store in the capital yet,
given the exceptional quality of your products?

Right, well, Mitsugoshi is still relatively new in
Velgalta.

First, we want to understand what the people of the
capital desire—the needs of the customer.

We aim to gain experience as merchants by truly
grasping what our customers in Velgalta want and
genuinely addressing these desires.

Only after making all the necessary preparations to
ensure satisfaction will we consider opening a store
in the capital.

So, if Mitsugoshi opens a store in the capital, will
that make me a VIP customer right from the start?
Yes, of course!

As our valued customer, Lady Curie Oso, who has
supported us here in our international trade...

After we open in the capital, we'll still be offering
you exclusive member perks, including early access
to new product launches!

We hope you'll continue to support Mitsugoshi as we
expand and grow in Velgalta.
My, my...! You're quite the clever one, aren't you?

I'm looking forward to my next visit. Maybe I'll
bring some of my friends along.
...Yes, things are running like clockwork!

(Since we plan on opening a Mitsugoshi store in the
capital...)

(Our initial aim is to attract aristocratic customers
who have a curiosity for new things by operating our
external sales department even before establishing a
physical store.)

(By providing exclusive and personalized services to
"premium customers," we'll stoke their egos and
desire to purchase our products. This will also
prompt word-of-mouth among customers.)

(And when the time comes to officially announce our
store's opening, we'll fully tap into the customer
base we've cultivated!)

This is the Shadow Wisdom I learned from our master—
the "Early Adopter VIP Strategy"!

(...And let's not forget, casual exchanges with these
aristocrats could provide invaluable intel for the
Shadow Garden!)

Following the Herzog Family massacre and Lady Karen
von Herzog's disappearance, a new swordswoman has
been selected as one of Velgalta's Seven Blades.

As a knight of the empire, it appears she has
officially begun investigating what happened to
Lady Karen.

We, the Shadow Garden, must swiftly grasp her
actions.

After all, she is at the heart of events that neither
the Garden nor the Cult of Diablos can overlook.
Her name is Annerose Nichtsehen.

As a knight of the Velgalta Empire, she continues to
hone her excellent sword skills, making her one of
the empire's top dark knights.

It was only a matter of time before she was chosen
for the Seven Blades. Following Lady Karen's
disappearance, she ascended to the position.

At just 19, she is said to be the youngest in the
history of the Seven Blades. But just who is she?

Could she be a potential asset, secretly utilized for
the Shadow Garden's operations within the empire?

Or, like Sergey of the Seven Blades, is she just a
pawn of the Cult of Diablos, conducting a sham
investigation?

We must swiftly uncover her true identity and use it
as a clue to grasp the Cult's operations in Velgalta,
which will help us understand Sergey’s actions!
Yes, ma'am.

Investigate Annerose Nichtsehen's movements and
gather intel. In the upcoming days, I plan to make
contact with her as Luna from Mitsugoshi.

Both of you are known in this empire. You especially,
No. 111, are the target of her investigation.

That said, utilizing your knowledge of the region
has its advantages. So, proceed with caution...
Understood?
Yes, ma'am!
Let's see what the two of them are capable of...
